gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nets 118, Pistons 112
gameRecap.excerpt: Despite Cade Cunningham’s 41 points (37 in the 2nd Half), the Pistons fell to the Nets, 118-112. Cam Johnson recorded a team-high 24 points and four 3PM for the Nets, while Mikal Bridges added 21 points, four rebounds and three assists in the victory. Cade Cunningham’s 37 points in the 2nd Half is the most by any Pistons player in a half since 1997-98. The Nets have won back-to-back games as they improve to 15-15 on the season, while the Pistons fall to 2-28.
